title: Environment variables are a legacy mess: Let's dive deep into them
summary:
Przemysław Kusiak's article delves into the often-overlooked world of environment variables (envvars), revealing their legacy nature and quirks. He explains that envvars are passed from parent processes to child processes via the `execve` system call in Linux. This call takes the executable path, command-line arguments, and an array of envvars as arguments.

While most tools inherit envvars, some like the `login` executable, create fresh environments. The kernel dumps envvars on the stack as null-terminated strings, which programs then copy into their own data structures. The article highlights how different languages handle envvars internally, focusing on Bash (using a stack of hashmaps with local scoping and export peculiarities), glibc (a dynamic array with linear complexity for `getenv` and `putenv`), and Python (coupling to the C library, potentially causing inconsistencies between `os.environ` and the actual environment).

Kusiak also covers the liberal format allowed by the kernel, which can lead to issues like duplicated names and entries without equals signs. He explains the size limits for individual variables (128 KiB) and the total environment (2 MiB). He debunks the misconception that POSIX mandates uppercase envvars, clarifying that it only recommends uppercase for standard utilities and reserves lowercase names for applications. He advises using uppercase with underscores for names and UTF-8 for values for broad compatibility, but suggests adhering to the portable character set for maximum safety. He concludes with a call to action to use RSS for independent blogging.
chinese_title: 环境变量是个历史遗留的烂摊子：让我们深入了解一下
chinese_summary:
Przemysław Kusiak 的文章深入探讨了常常被忽视的环境变量（envvars）领域，揭示了它们的历史遗留特性和怪癖。他解释说，在 Linux 中，环境变量通过 `execve` 系统调用从父进程传递到子进程。该调用接受可执行文件路径、命令行参数和一个环境变量数组作为参数。

虽然大多数工具会继承环境变量，但有些工具（如 `login` 可执行文件）会创建全新的环境。内核将环境变量作为以 null 结尾的字符串转储到堆栈中，然后程序将其复制到自己的数据结构中。文章重点介绍了不同语言如何内部处理环境变量，重点介绍了 Bash（使用带有本地作用域和导出特性的哈希映射堆栈）、glibc（具有线性复杂度的 `getenv` 和 `putenv` 的动态数组）和 Python（与 C 库耦合，可能导致 `os.environ` 和实际环境之间的不一致）。

Kusiak 还介绍了内核允许的宽松格式，这可能导致诸如名称重复和没有等号的条目等问题。他解释了单个变量的大小限制（128 KiB）和总环境的大小限制（2 MiB）。他驳斥了 POSIX 强制要求大写环境变量的误解，澄清说它只是建议标准实用程序使用大写，并为应用程序保留小写名称。他建议使用带下划线的大写字母作为名称，并使用 UTF-8 作为值，以获得广泛的兼容性，但建议坚持使用可移植字符集以获得最大的安全性。他最后呼吁使用 RSS 进行独立博客写作。

title: Show HN: SQLite Online – 11 years of solo development, 11K daily users
summary:
SQLite Online is a solo-developed, web-based SQLite editor boasting 11 years of development and 11,000 daily users. It offers import, export, and run functionality, syntax highlighting, table view, history, and charting capabilities for data science. Charting uses a custom query language prefixing `SELECT` with `QLINE-`, `QAREA-`, `QBAR-`, `QPIE-`, and `QBUBBLE-` allowing for visual representations of data. It leverages various open-source libraries including Sql.js, DuckDB, PGLite, Font-Awesome, CodeMirror, Toastify, and Chart.js.

The platform is continually updated, with a detailed history log showcasing features added over time including DuckDB & PGLite Integration, Virtual Table federation, improved Chart parser & export, Ai-Help, XLSX export, OpFS support, cloud save links, regular SQLite WASM migration, removed query size limits, added regexp functions, improved UI/UX, color themes, SQLite server sharing, Docker versions, intelligent import, and much more.

Users can configure settings such as storage type (Memory, IndexDB, OpFS), left menu behavior, editor preferences (autocompletion, error highlighting, AI suggestions), UI skins, table appearance (hover effects, number formatting), and old button panel visibility.

The platform is provided "AS IS" with a general disclaimer and emphasizes user responsibility regarding uploaded content and compliance with data privacy.
chinese_title: Show HN: SQLite Online – 11年独立开发，日活用户1.1万
chinese_summary:
SQLite Online 是一个独立开发的基于网络的 SQLite 编辑器，拥有 11 年的开发历史和 11,000 名日活跃用户。它提供导入、导出和运行功能，以及语法高亮、表格视图、历史记录和数据科学图表功能。图表功能使用自定义查询语言，在 `SELECT` 前加上 `QLINE-`、`QAREA-`、`QBAR-`、`QPIE-` 和 `QBUBBLE-`，以实现数据的可视化表示。它利用了各种开源库，包括 Sql.js、DuckDB、PGLite、Font-Awesome、CodeMirror、Toastify 和 Chart.js。

该平台不断更新，详细的历史记录日志展示了随着时间的推移添加的功能，包括 DuckDB 和 PGLite 集成、虚拟表联合、改进的图表解析器和导出、Ai 帮助、XLSX 导出、OpFS 支持、云保存链接、定期 SQLite WASM 迁移、删除查询大小限制、添加 regexp 函数、改进的 UI/UX、颜色主题、SQLite 服务器共享、Docker 版本、智能导入等等。

用户可以配置设置，例如存储类型（内存、IndexDB、OpFS）、左侧菜单行为、编辑器首选项（自动完成、错误突出显示、AI 建议）、UI 皮肤、表格外观（悬停效果、数字格式）和旧按钮面板可见性。

该平台按“原样”提供，包含一般免责声明，并强调用户对上传内容以及遵守数据隐私的责任。

title: NanoChat – The best ChatGPT that $100 can buy
summary:
NanoChat is a full-stack, minimal implementation of a ChatGPT-like LLM designed to be run on a single 8XH100 node for around $100. The `speedrun.sh` script automates the entire pipeline, including tokenization, pretraining, finetuning, evaluation, inference, and web serving. After about 4 hours, users can interact with their own LLM through a simple web UI.

The project aims to make LLMs accessible, emphasizing simplicity, readability, and hackability over exhaustive configuration. While the $100 tier produces a basic model, the project suggests scaling to ~$300 or $1000 for improved performance, comparable to GPT-2. This can be done by downloading more data and reducing the device batch size to manage memory.

The repository encourages users to ask questions of the codebase, either by packaging the files into a prompt for an LLM or using DeepWiki. Contributing to NanoChat focuses on improving micro models accessible on limited budgets while keeping the code minimal and easy to understand. The project is inspired by nanoGPT and modded-nanoGPT and acknowledges HuggingFace, Lambda, and Alec Radford for their contributions.
chinese_title: NanoChat - 100美元能买到的最佳ChatGPT
chinese_summary:
NanoChat：一个极简的全栈类ChatGPT大语言模型，旨在单台8XH100节点上以约100美元的成本运行。`speedrun.sh`脚本自动化整个流程，包括分词、预训练、微调、评估、推理和网络服务。大约4小时后，用户可以通过简单的Web界面与他们自己的大语言模型交互。

该项目旨在使大语言模型更易于访问，强调简洁性、可读性和可破解性，而不是详尽的配置。虽然100美元的预算只能产生一个基础模型，但该项目建议扩展到约300美元或1000美元，以获得更好的性能，与GPT-2相当。这可以通过下载更多数据并减少设备批量大小来管理内存来实现。

该存储库鼓励用户向代码库提问，可以通过将文件打包到大语言模型的提示中或使用DeepWiki来实现。对NanoChat的贡献侧重于改进在有限预算下可访问的微型模型，同时保持代码的最小化和易于理解。该项目受到nanoGPT和modded-nanoGPT的启发，并感谢HuggingFace、Lambda和Alec Radford的贡献。

title: JSON River – Parse JSON incrementally as it streams in
summary:
`jsonriver` is a lightweight JavaScript library for parsing JSON incrementally as it streams in, offering a sequence of increasingly complete values. This allows processing JSON from sources like network requests or language models without waiting for the entire document to load.

Key features:

*   **Incremental Parsing:** Provides a stream of JSON values, showing the JSON object's evolution as it's being parsed.
*   **Lightweight & Fast:** Small, dependency-free, and utilizes standard JavaScript features. It's designed for broad compatibility.
*   **Correctness:** Guarantees the final parsed value matches the output of `JSON.parse`. Extensive testing ensures compliance with the JSONTestSuite.
*   **Invariants:** Maintains data type consistency throughout the incremental updates, ensuring predictable behavior. Arrays are appended to or the last element is modified, objects are added to or the most recent property is modified.
*   **Use Cases:** Useful when parsing data streams from sources such as network requests or language models.

While `JSON.parse` is faster for complete JSON strings and `stream-json` offers more features, `jsonriver` strikes a balance between speed and incremental processing capabilities, making it suitable for applications requiring real-time updates or memory-efficient parsing of large JSON documents.
chinese_title: JSON 河流 - 增量解析流式JSON数据
chinese_summary:
`jsonriver` 是一个轻量级的 JavaScript 库，用于在 JSON 数据流式传输时对其进行增量解析，从而提供一系列逐渐完整的数值。这允许从网络请求或语言模型等来源处理 JSON，而无需等待整个文档加载完成。

主要特点：

*   **增量解析：** 提供 JSON 值的流，展示 JSON 对象在解析过程中的演变。
*   **轻量快速：** 体积小，无依赖，并利用标准 JavaScript 功能。它专为广泛的兼容性而设计。
*   **正确性：** 保证最终解析的值与 `JSON.parse` 的输出一致。经过广泛的测试，确保符合 JSONTestSuite 标准。
*   **不变性：** 在整个增量更新过程中保持数据类型的一致性，确保可预测的行为。数组会被追加或修改最后一个元素，对象会被添加或修改最近的属性。
*   **应用场景：** 在解析来自网络请求或语言模型等来源的数据流时非常有用。

虽然 `JSON.parse` 在处理完整的 JSON 字符串时速度更快，而 `stream-json` 提供了更多的功能，但 `jsonriver` 在速度和增量处理能力之间取得了平衡，使其适用于需要实时更新或对大型 JSON 文档进行内存高效解析的应用程序。

title: Spotlight on pdfly, the Swiss Army knife for PDF files
summary:
This article introduces pdfly, a command-line tool written in Python for manipulating PDF files, based on the fpdf2 & pypdf libraries. Maintained by Lucas Cimon, pdfly offers a range of functionalities, acting as a "Swiss Army knife" for PDF tasks. It can display metadata, combine and merge PDFs, remove pages, convert images to PDFs, compress documents, and create booklets. It also includes tools for extracting images and annotated text.

A key feature is the `pdfly update-offsets` command, which fixes manually edited PDF files by repairing their xref tables. The article announces the release of version 0.5.0, which introduces new features such as `pdfly sign` and `pdfly check-sign` for signing and verifying PDF signatures, implemented by @moormaster. Another addition is `pdfly extract-annotated-pages` by Hal Wine, for extracting only the pages with annotations. And `pdfly rotate` by Subhajit Sahu, rotates specific pages.

The article highlights opportunities for contribution with "up-for-grabs" issues and encourages user feedback and feature suggestions, particularly for expanding the signing functionality. The goal is to make pdfly a more versatile and user-friendly tool for managing PDF documents.
chinese_title: 聚焦pdfly：PDF文件的瑞士军刀
chinese_summary:
本文介绍pdfly，一个用Python编写的命令行工具，基于fpdf2 & pypdf库，用于处理PDF文件。pdfly由Lucas Cimon维护，提供一系列功能，堪称PDF任务的“瑞士军刀”。它可以显示元数据、合并PDF、删除页面、将图像转换为PDF、压缩文档以及创建小册子。它还包括提取图像和带注释文本的工具。

一个关键特性是`pdfly update-offsets`命令，它通过修复交叉引用表来修复手动编辑的PDF文件。本文宣布发布0.5.0版本，该版本引入了新功能，例如由@moormaster实现的用于签名和验证PDF签名的`pdfly sign`和`pdfly check-sign`。另一项新增功能是由Hal Wine实现的`pdfly extract-annotated-pages`，用于仅提取带有注释的页面。以及Subhajit Sahu实现的`pdfly rotate`，用于旋转特定页面。

本文强调了通过“up-for-grabs”问题进行贡献的机会，并鼓励用户反馈和功能建议，特别是扩展签名功能。目标是使pdfly成为一个更通用和用户友好的PDF文档管理工具。

title: The Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel 2025
summary:
The 2025 Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel was awarded to Joel Mokyr, Philippe Aghion, and Peter Howitt for their contributions to understanding innovation-driven economic growth.

Joel Mokyr received half of the prize for his work identifying the factors necessary for sustained economic growth fueled by technological progress. He explored the historical and cultural conditions that fostered innovation, emphasizing the importance of intellectual openness, communication, and institutions supporting technological advancement.

Philippe Aghion and Peter Howitt jointly received the other half of the prize for developing the "creative destruction" theory of sustained growth. This theory highlights how innovation inevitably disrupts existing industries and technologies, leading to the creation of new ones. This constant cycle of destruction and creation is a central driver of long-term economic prosperity.

The article's navigation allows users to access detailed information about each laureate, including summaries, the prize announcement, press releases, popular information, and advanced information. It also provides visual representations of the laureates. A "Back to top" function simplifies navigation within the page.
chinese_title: 2025年 纪念阿尔弗雷德·诺贝尔瑞典国家银行经济学奖
chinese_summary:
2025年瑞典国家银行纪念阿尔弗雷德·诺贝尔经济学奖授予乔尔·莫基尔、菲利普·阿吉翁和彼得·豪伊特，以表彰他们对理解创新驱动型经济增长所做的贡献。

乔尔·莫基尔因其在识别技术进步推动持续经济增长的必要因素方面的工作而获得一半奖金。他探讨了促进创新的历史和文化条件，强调了思想开放、交流以及支持技术进步的机构的重要性。

菲利普·阿吉翁和彼得·豪伊特因共同发展了关于持续增长的“创造性破坏”理论而共同获得另一半奖金。该理论强调创新不可避免地会扰乱现有产业和技术，从而导致新产业和技术的产生。这种持续的破坏和创造的循环是长期经济繁荣的核心驱动力。

文章导航允许用户访问关于每位获奖者的详细信息，包括摘要、颁奖公告、新闻稿、大众信息和高级信息。它还提供获奖者的视觉呈现。“返回顶部”功能简化了页面内的导航。

title: More random home lab things I've recently learned
summary:
This article details the author's recent experiences and learning within their home lab, a setup involving Proxmox, TrueNAS, Raspberry Pi, and various networking components. They encountered several issues and share the solutions they discovered.

First, a Raspberry Pi 5 used as a Proxmox node was experiencing severe slowdowns due to a failing SD card. The author discovered that the Pi 5 supports NVMe SSDs via an adapter, offering a significant performance boost. However, installing an OS on the SSD required a workaround involving modifying Raspberry Pi OS to enable PCI-E.

Next, Proxmox on the Pi 5 experienced unexpected OOM (Out Of Memory) kills of VMs, resolved by explicitly setting the kernel page size. They also noted that ARM VMs required the OVMF (UEFI) BIOS to function correctly. A useful tip involved using `kpartx` to mount QEMU VM disks for debugging.

Furthermore, the author encountered a deadlock issue with Proxmox Backup Server (PBS) when the ZFS volume filled up. The solution involved deleting ZFS snapshots to free space, preventing garbage collection from failing. A quota was set to prevent future occurrences.

Other insights include the author finding and using CyberPower UPS management software, a positive experience with Davis for CALDAV server hosting, and enthusiastic use of Mealie for recipe management, including contributing a small PR. They advocate for Mealie over typical recipe blogs, praising its structured format and organization.
chinese_title: 最近学到的一些家庭实验室零碎知识
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者最近在家用实验室中的经验和学习，该实验室包含 Proxmox、TrueNAS、Raspberry Pi 以及各种网络组件。他们遇到了一些问题，并分享了他们发现的解决方案。

首先，用作 Proxmox 节点的 Raspberry Pi 5 由于 SD 卡故障而出现严重减速。作者发现 Pi 5 支持通过适配器使用 NVMe SSD，从而显著提升性能。但是，在 SSD 上安装操作系统需要一种解决方法，即修改 Raspberry Pi OS 以启用 PCI-E。

接下来，Pi 5 上的 Proxmox 经历了虚拟机意外的 OOM（内存不足）终止，通过显式设置内核页面大小解决了该问题。他们还指出，ARM 虚拟机需要 OVMF (UEFI) BIOS 才能正常工作。一个有用的技巧是使用 `kpartx` 来挂载 QEMU 虚拟机磁盘以进行调试。

此外，当 ZFS 卷已满时，作者遇到了 Proxmox Backup Server (PBS) 的死锁问题。解决方案是删除 ZFS 快照以释放空间，防止垃圾回收失败。设置了配额以防止将来发生这种情况。

其他见解包括作者找到并使用了 CyberPower UPS 管理软件，在使用 Davis 进行 CALDAV 服务器托管方面获得了积极的体验，以及热衷于使用 Mealie 进行食谱管理，包括贡献了一个小型 PR。他们提倡使用 Mealie 而不是典型的食谱博客，赞扬其结构化格式和组织。

title: American solar farms
summary:
This article details the creation and exploration of the Ground-Mounted Solar Energy in the United States (GM-SEUS) dataset, a comprehensive collection of data on utility and commercial-grade solar farms across the lower 48 states and DC. Created by researchers from NOAA, NASA, and USGS, the dataset is divided into arrays and panels.

The author describes their powerful workstation used for the analysis, including its CPU, RAM, SSD, and operating system. They then outline the process of installing necessary prerequisites like GDAL and DuckDB with various extensions for spatial and data manipulation.

The core of the article focuses on cleaning, transforming, and optimizing the GM-SEUS data using DuckDB. This includes converting the data into ZStandard-compressed, spatially-sorted Parquet files, handling missing values, and creating geometry fields and bounding boxes for each feature. The author provides the DuckDB commands used for this process.

The article then explores the arrays dataset, providing an example record, summarizing the data types and statistics of each field, and generating a heatmap of asset locations using H3 geospatial indexing and ArcGIS Pro. The analysis also examines the relationship between data sources, installation year, mount type, module type, and array capacity. Finally, the author provides an example record and data statistics for the panels dataset.
chinese_title: 美国太阳能农场
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了美国地面安装太阳能（GM-SEUS）数据集的创建和探索，该数据集全面收集了美国本土48州和哥伦比亚特区公用事业和商业级太阳能发电场的数据。该数据集由来自NOAA、NASA和USGS的研究人员创建，分为阵列和面板两部分。

作者描述了用于分析的强大工作站，包括其CPU、RAM、SSD和操作系统。然后，他们概述了安装必要先决条件的过程，如GDAL和DuckDB以及用于空间和数据操作的各种扩展。

文章的核心集中在使用DuckDB对GM-SEUS数据进行清理、转换和优化。这包括将数据转换为ZStandard压缩的、空间排序的Parquet文件，处理缺失值，以及为每个要素创建几何字段和边界框。作者提供了用于此过程的DuckDB命令。

文章随后探讨了阵列数据集，提供了一个示例记录，总结了每个字段的数据类型和统计信息，并使用H3地理空间索引和ArcGIS Pro生成了资产位置的热图。分析还考察了数据来源、安装年份、安装类型、组件类型和阵列容量之间的关系。最后，作者提供了面板数据集的示例记录和数据统计信息。

title: MPTCP for Linux
summary:
MPTCP (Multipath TCP), an extension to standard TCP (RFC 8684), allows devices to use multiple network interfaces simultaneously for a single connection, aggregating bandwidth, preferring low latency paths, and providing seamless failover. Unlike TCP, which uses a single path, MPTCP creates multiple "subflows" (TCP connections) over different interfaces.

Key use cases include seamless handovers between networks (like smartphones switching between Wi-Fi and cellular), selecting the best network based on factors like latency or cost, and aggregating bandwidth from multiple networks for higher throughput.

Technically, an MPTCP socket creates initial subflows, and more can be negotiated. The `MP_CAPABLE` option in the TCP header signals MPTCP support. If the remote host doesn't support MPTCP, the connection falls back to standard TCP.

The system uses a Path Manager to handle subflow creation and address announcements (server-side) and a Packet Scheduler to distribute packets across subflows based on configured policies. Linux offers both in-kernel (rules applied globally, managed via `ip mptcp`) and userspace Path Managers (managed by a daemon like `mptcpd`, rules applied on a per-connection basis). The packet scheduler handles packets distribution between available subflows.

Linux v6.10 supports the IPPROTO_MPTCP protocol, fallback to TCP, in-kernel/userspace path management, socket options, and debugging features. The MPTCP community maintains projects including kernel development, the mptcpd daemon, and MPTCP enhancements for tools like iproute2 and Network Manager.
chinese_title: Linux 的 MPTCP
chinese_summary:
MPTCP (多径TCP) 是标准TCP (RFC 8684) 的扩展，允许设备同时使用多个网络接口进行单次连接，从而聚合带宽、优先选择低延迟路径并提供无缝故障转移。与使用单路径的TCP不同，MPTCP在不同的接口上创建多个“子流”（TCP连接）。

主要用例包括网络间的无缝切换（例如智能手机在Wi-Fi和蜂窝网络之间切换）、基于延迟或成本等因素选择最佳网络，以及聚合来自多个网络的带宽以获得更高的吞吐量。

从技术上讲，MPTCP套接字会创建初始子流，并且可以协商更多子流。TCP头中的 `MP_CAPABLE` 选项表示支持MPTCP。如果远程主机不支持MPTCP，则连接会回退到标准TCP。

该系统使用路径管理器来处理子流创建和地址通告（服务器端），并使用数据包调度器根据配置的策略将数据包分发到各个子流。Linux提供内核内（全局应用规则，通过 `ip mptcp` 管理）和用户空间路径管理器（由守护程序（如 `mptcpd`）管理，规则按连接应用）。数据包调度器负责在可用的子流之间分配数据包。

Linux v6.10 支持 IPPROTO_MPTCP 协议、回退到TCP、内核内/用户空间路径管理、套接字选项和调试功能。MPTCP社区维护的项目包括内核开发、mptcpd守护程序以及对诸如iproute2和Network Manager等工具的MPTCP增强功能。

title: AI and the Future of American Politics
summary:
This article, published in October 2025, examines the multifaceted role of AI in shaping American politics, particularly in the upcoming 2026 midterm elections. It identifies three main groups leveraging AI: campaigners, organizers, and citizens.

Campaigners are using AI for efficiency, automating tasks like fundraising solicitations and targeted advertising. While seemingly an extension of existing computerization, AI significantly scales these capabilities, potentially impacting even safe district races. Republicans and Democrats are both investing in AI for campaigning, though a funding gap exists, with Democrats having more venture capital support.

Organizers are exploring more radical applications, from AI-generated political platforms to facilitating public deliberation and citizen assemblies. There's also a push for "Public AI" to move control away from corporations. Labor unions are both fighting AI's potential to displace workers and using it to enhance their own organizing efforts.

Citizens are utilizing AI for various purposes, including challenging voter registrations (though controversial) and safeguarding election integrity through disinformation detection. More commonly, AI is used for self-expression, such as drafting messages to elected officials.

The article warns that AI's potential to disrupt elections isn't just about deepfakes but also the possibility of authoritarian governments using AI to surveil and control political speech. The author concludes that the impact of AI depends on the interaction of these diverse uses and the lack of regulation, as AI companies heavily lobby against it. The upcoming midterms will be shaped by current experimentation with AI, giving those who find effective uses a significant advantage.
chinese_title: 人工智能与美国政治的未来
chinese_summary:
这篇发表于2025年10月的文章探讨了人工智能在塑造美国政治，尤其是在即将到来的2026年中期选举中，所扮演的多重角色。文章指出主要有三类群体正在利用人工智能：竞选者、组织者和公民。

竞选者正在利用人工智能提高效率，实现诸如筹款请求和定向广告等任务的自动化。虽然看似是现有计算机化的延伸，但人工智能显著地扩展了这些能力，可能甚至会影响到安全的选区竞选。共和党和民主党都在投资人工智能用于竞选活动，但存在资金差距，民主党拥有更多的风险投资支持。

组织者正在探索更激进的应用，从人工智能生成的政治纲领到促进公众审议和公民大会。同时，也有一种将控制权从公司手中转移出来的“公共人工智能”的呼声。工会既在抵制人工智能取代工人的潜力，也在利用它来加强自身的组织工作。

公民正在利用人工智能进行各种活动，包括质疑选民登记（尽管存在争议）以及通过虚假信息检测来维护选举的公正性。更常见的是，人工智能被用于自我表达，例如起草给当选官员的信息。

文章警告说，人工智能破坏选举的潜力不仅仅在于深度伪造，还在于威权政府可能利用人工智能来监视和控制政治言论。作者总结说，人工智能的影响取决于这些不同用途的相互作用以及缺乏监管，因为人工智能公司大力游说反对监管。即将到来的中期选举将受到当前人工智能实验的影响，这将使那些找到有效用途的人获得显著优势。

title: $19B Wiped Out in Crypto's Biggest Liquidation
summary:
The article, titled "$19B Wiped Out in Crypto's Biggest Liquidation," presents a snapshot of cryptocurrency prices. While the title suggests a massive market event, the accompanying content primarily provides a long list of cryptocurrency prices and their percentage changes over a given period. The list includes major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), and XRP, as well as a wide array of smaller altcoins and stablecoins. Percentage changes reflect a mixed bag, with some coins experiencing gains and others losses. Notable large swings include a 35.43% drop in COAI and 25.17% gain in ATH.

Without further context or analysis, it's difficult to fully assess the implications of the $19B liquidation. The provided data gives a narrow view of price fluctuations across various cryptocurrencies without detailing the underlying causes of the alleged liquidation or the broader market conditions. The extensive price list, however, serves as a reference point for individual coin performance.
chinese_title: 加密货币最大清算潮：190亿美元蒸发
chinese_summary:
《加密货币最大清算：190亿美元蒸发》这篇文章呈现了加密货币价格的快照。虽然标题暗示了一场巨大的市场事件，但随附的内容主要提供了一个加密货币价格及其在给定时期内的百分比变化的长列表。该列表包括比特币（BTC）、以太坊（ETH）、币安币（BNB）和瑞波币（XRP）等主要加密货币，以及各种较小的山寨币和稳定币。百分比变化反映了涨跌互现的情况，一些代币上涨，另一些代币下跌。值得注意的大幅波动包括COAI下跌35.43%和ATH上涨25.17%。

在没有进一步的背景或分析的情况下，很难充分评估190亿美元清算的含义。所提供的数据仅提供了各种加密货币价格波动的狭隘视角，没有详细说明所谓清算的根本原因或更广泛的市场状况。然而，这份广泛的价格列表可以作为衡量各种代币表现的参考点。

title: Software update bricks some Jeep 4xe hybrids over the weekend
summary:
A recent over-the-air software update for the Uconnect infotainment system in Jeep Wrangler 4xe hybrids caused widespread issues, leaving some owners stranded. The update, pushed out over the weekend, caused vehicles to lose power while driving, leading to powertrain failures, sometimes at highway speeds.

Affected owners have reported their experiences online, detailing the sudden power loss after installing the update. While the issue wasn't immediate, it manifested during driving, making it a more dangerous problem.

Jeep has since pulled the problematic update after receiving numerous complaints. They advised owners who hadn't installed the update to ignore the pop-up notification and cautioned those who had updated to avoid hybrid or electric modes. A fix has since been released. The incident highlights the potential risks of poorly tested software updates, particularly on a Friday afternoon, as previously demonstrated by Crowdstrike. Ars Technica has reached out to Stellantis for comment.
chinese_title: 周末软件更新导致部分Jeep 4xe插电混动版变砖
chinese_summary:
Jeep牧马人4xe混动车型Uconnect信息娱乐系统最近的一次无线软件更新引发了大范围问题，导致部分车主被困。这次周末推送的更新导致车辆在行驶中失去动力，进而引发动力系统故障，有时甚至是在高速公路上。

受影响的车主已在网上报告了他们的遭遇，详细描述了安装更新后突然失去动力的情况。虽然问题不是立即出现，但它在驾驶过程中显现，使其成为一个更加危险的问题。

在收到大量投诉后，Jeep已撤回了有问题的更新。他们建议尚未安装更新的车主忽略弹出通知，并警告已更新的车主避免使用混合动力或电动模式。修复程序已经发布。该事件凸显了未经充分测试的软件更新的潜在风险，尤其是在星期五下午，正如Crowdstrike之前所展示的那样。Ars Technica已联系Stellantis寻求置评。

title: Smartphones and being present
summary:
This article discusses the author's concerns about excessive smartphone use and its negative impact on being present and intentional in life. Citing statistics showing people spend significant amounts of time on their phones, the author argues that this distracts from meaningful experiences and relationships.

The author details their personal struggle with smartphone usage and the tactics they've implemented to regain control. These strategies include minimizing the phone's appeal by deleting recommendation-based social media apps and actively blocking distracting content, particularly on YouTube. They disabled their YouTube watch history to eliminate algorithm-driven recommendations and used an adblocker to hide shorts and suggested videos.

The author criticizes time-limit apps as ineffective because they don't address the underlying addiction and are easily circumvented. Their approach focuses on making the phone as "uninteresting as possible," thereby reducing the urge to constantly check it. While acknowledging the difficulty of breaking ingrained habits, the author emphasizes the positive results of their methods: increased presence, reduced distraction, and more time for enriching activities. The author believes the collective time lost to smartphones globally is alarming and primarily spent on unproductive entertainment. They advocate for readers to try their approach to reclaim their time and attention, resulting in a more fulfilling and optimistic life.
chinese_title: 智能手机与当下
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了作者对过度使用智能手机的担忧，以及它对活在当下和有意识生活所产生的负面影响。作者引用统计数据表明人们花费大量时间在手机上，并认为这会分散人们对有意义的经历和关系的注意力。

作者详细描述了自己与智能手机使用的斗争，以及为重新掌控局面所采取的策略。这些策略包括通过删除基于推荐的社交媒体应用和积极屏蔽分散注意力的内容（尤其是在YouTube上）来最大限度地降低手机的吸引力。他们禁用了YouTube观看历史记录，以消除算法驱动的推荐，并使用广告拦截器来隐藏短视频和推荐视频。

作者批评了时间限制应用程序的无效性，因为它们无法解决根本的成瘾问题，并且很容易被规避。他们的做法侧重于使手机“尽可能无趣”，从而减少不断查看手机的冲动。虽然承认打破根深蒂固的习惯很困难，但作者强调了他们方法的积极成果：增强的临场感、减少的分心以及更多用于丰富生活的活动的时间。作者认为全球范围内因智能手机而损失的集体时间令人震惊，并且主要用于无益的娱乐。他们提倡读者尝试他们的方法来重新获得时间和注意力，从而过上更充实和乐观的生活。

title: Control your Canon Camera wirelessly
summary:
Cine Remote is an app that allows wireless remote control of Canon cameras using their built-in WiFi capabilities. Currently, it supports the Canon C100II, EOS 70D, and EOS R7. The app's development relies on reverse-engineered protocols, so edge cases might not be handled perfectly.

Key features include: network discovery of supported cameras, pairing and remembering connections, control of aperture, ISO, shutter angle, and white balance, start/stop recording, image capturing (limited), property update handling, and a Live View preview. A demo mode allows users to try the app without a supported camera.

Supported cameras utilize different protocols. The C100II uses EosCineHttp, but image capturing is unavailable. The EOS 70D and R7 use PTP/IP; however, the 70D cannot record movies with WiFi enabled.

Future development plans include improving camera discovery using UPNP, adding support for more cameras (especially CCAPI-based EOS models), and enhancing error handling, particularly for camera disconnections.
chinese_title: 无线控制你的佳能相机
chinese_summary:
Cine Remote 是一款应用程序，允许使用佳能相机内置的 WiFi 功能进行无线遥控。目前，它支持佳能 C100II、EOS 70D 和 EOS R7。该应用程序的开发依赖于逆向工程协议，因此可能无法完美处理极端情况。

主要功能包括：搜索支持的相机、配对和记住连接、控制光圈、ISO、快门角度和白平衡、开始/停止录制、图像捕获（有限）、属性更新处理和实时预览。演示模式允许用户在没有支持的相机的情况下试用该应用程序。

支持的相机使用不同的协议。C100II 使用 EosCineHttp，但无法捕获图像。EOS 70D 和 R7 使用 PTP/IP；但是，70D 在启用 WiFi 的情况下无法录制电影。

未来的开发计划包括：改进使用 UPNP 的相机搜索、增加对更多相机的支持（尤其是基于 CCAPI 的 EOS 型号），以及增强错误处理，特别是对于相机断开连接的情况。

title: Matrices can be your Friends
summary:
Steve Baker's "Matrices can be your Friends" demystifies matrices for novice graphics programmers, particularly focusing on their use in OpenGL. The core idea is to visualize a matrix as a transformation of a unit cube located at the origin.

The article explains that an OpenGL matrix, represented as a 16-element array (m[0] to m[15]), can be understood by conceptually arranging it in four columns. For rigid body transformations, the last row (m[3], m[7], m[11], m[15]) is usually 0, 0, 0, and 1, and can be temporarily ignored. The first three elements of the last column (m[12], m[13], m[14]) represent the translation vector.

The remaining nine elements (top three of the first three columns) define the rotation. The article details how these nine numbers dictate the new location of the x, y, and z axes of the unit cube after transformation. For example, (1,0,0) becomes (m[0], m[1], m[2]). The translation vector is then added to each transformed point.

The article further illustrates how to achieve scaling, shearing, and squashing effects by manipulating the matrix elements, relating changes in the matrix to deformations of the visualized cube. Finally, it explains the "Identity" matrix's function as a "do nothing" transformation, leaving the axes unchanged. By mentally visualizing the cube, one can avoid complex mathematical operations and optimize graphics transformations.
chinese_title: 矩阵可以是你的朋友
chinese_summary:
史蒂夫·贝克的《矩阵可以成为你的朋友》一文为初级图形程序员揭开了矩阵的神秘面纱，尤其侧重于它们在OpenGL中的应用。其核心思想是将矩阵可视化为对位于原点的单位立方体的变换。

文章解释说，一个OpenGL矩阵，表示为一个16个元素的数组（m[0]到m[15]），可以通过概念性地将其排列成四列来理解。对于刚体变换，最后一行（m[3], m[7], m[11], m[15]）通常是0、0、0和1，可以暂时忽略。最后一列的前三个元素（m[12], m[13], m[14]）代表平移向量。

剩余的九个元素（前三列的顶部三个）定义了旋转。文章详细介绍了这九个数字如何决定变换后单位立方体的x、y和z轴的新位置。例如，(1,0,0)变为(m[0], m[1], m[2])。然后将平移向量添加到每个变换后的点。

文章进一步阐述了如何通过操纵矩阵元素来实现缩放、剪切和挤压效果，并将矩阵中的变化与可视化立方体的变形联系起来。最后，它解释了“单位”矩阵作为“什么都不做”的变换的功能，使轴保持不变。通过在脑海中可视化立方体，可以避免复杂的数学运算并优化图形变换。

title: Apple Renames 'Apple TV+' to 'Apple TV'
summary:
This press release announces that Apple Original Films' "F1 The Movie," starring Brad Pitt and directed by Joseph Kosinski, will make its global streaming debut on Apple TV on December 12, 2025, following a highly successful theatrical run. The film has already broken records, becoming the highest-grossing sports film of all time, surpassing $629 million at the global box office. It is also this year’s highest-grossing original feature and Brad Pitt’s highest-grossing film to date.

The film tells the story of Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt), a former Formula 1 phenom, who returns to racing to save a struggling team, alongside rookie Joshua Pearce (Damson Idris). The film was shot during actual Grand Prix weekends and also stars Javier Bardem, Kerry Condon, and Tobias Menzies.

Producer Jerry Bruckheimer emphasizes the excitement of bringing the film to a wider audience through Apple TV's global reach. The press release also highlights the success of the "F1 The Album" soundtrack, which has achieved over one billion global streams.

Importantly, the release also announces that "Apple TV+" has been rebranded as simply "Apple TV." Finally, it notes that “F1 The Movie” will also be available for purchase on platforms like the Apple TV app and Amazon Prime Video.
chinese_title: 苹果将“Apple TV+”更名为“Apple TV”
chinese_summary:
新闻稿宣布，由布拉德·皮特主演、约瑟夫·科辛斯基执导的Apple Original Films电影《F1赛车》，在院线大获成功后，将于2025年12月12日在Apple TV上全球首播。这部电影已经打破纪录，成为有史以来票房最高的体育电影，全球票房超过6.29亿美元。它也是今年票房最高的原创电影，也是布拉德·皮特迄今为止票房最高的电影。

该片讲述了前一级方程式赛车天才索尼·海耶斯（布拉德·皮特饰）的故事，他重返赛场，与新秀约书亚·皮尔斯（达姆森·伊德里斯饰）一起拯救一支苦苦挣扎的车队。该片在实际的F1大奖赛周末拍摄，哈维尔·巴登、凯瑞·康顿和托比亚斯·门基斯也参与演出。

制片人杰瑞·布鲁克海默强调了通过Apple TV的全球影响力将这部电影带给更广泛观众的兴奋之情。新闻稿还强调了《F1赛车专辑》原声带的成功，该专辑的全球播放量已超过10亿次。

重要的是，该新闻稿还宣布“Apple TV+”已更名为“Apple TV”。最后，它指出《F1赛车》也可在Apple TV应用程序和Amazon Prime Video等平台上购买。
